title: why i cant make name without numbers on?
body: When i want to make new acc i cant make without numbers,why?

replies.body: You should be able to, unless the name you're trying to make is taken.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), though, and we can manually adjust your name as long as you have to currency available.  See you there!
